metadata.title: Fits Library
metadata.notes: Metadata for common ISO 286 and ANSI/ASME B4.1 fits. ANSI/ASME classes are mapped to ISO equivalents for calculation.

clearance.label: Clearance fit
clearance.notes: Always positive clearance for free running or sliding motion.

transition.label: Transition fit
transition.notes: May result in clearance or interference depending on actual sizes.

interference.label: Interference fit
interference.notes: Negative clearance requiring press or thermal assembly.

fit_groups.label: ISO 286 Hole Basis
fit_groups.description: Common ISO hole-basis fits spanning clearance, transition, and interference classes.

fits.title: Loose running fit
fits.description: Very loose clearance for rough alignment and free running at low speed.

fits.title: Free running fit
fits.description: Large clearance fit for low precision assemblies that must run freely.

fits.title: Wide running fit
fits.description: Running fit with generous clearance for easy assembly and thermal growth.

fits.title: Close running fit
fits.description: Close running fit with controlled clearance and good guidance.

fits.title: Precision running fit
fits.description: High accuracy running fit with small clearance and good repeatability.

fits.title: Close running fit
fits.description: Running fit with minimal play for smooth motion and alignment.

fits.title: Sliding fit
fits.description: Sliding fit with small clearance for accurate location and easy assembly.

fits.title: Locational clearance fit
fits.description: Standard sliding fit with zero shaft fundamental deviation.

fits.title: Locational clearance fit (coarser)
fits.description: Clearance fit with larger tolerances for easier assembly.

fits.title: Precision sliding fit
fits.description: Fine sliding fit with tight tolerances for precision guidance.

fits.title: Precision locational clearance fit
fits.description: Very accurate clearance fit for repeated assembly.

fits.title: Line-to-line fit
fits.description: Centered transition fit with minimal clearance or interference.

fits.title: Snug fit
fits.description: Transition fit biased toward clearance with very small play.

fits.title: Light transition fit
fits.description: Location fit with small interference likely on assembly.

fits.title: Medium transition fit
fits.description: Transition fit with higher interference probability for firm location.

fits.title: Transition fit (coarser)
fits.description: Wider transition band for easier assembly with possible light interference.

fits.title: Light transition fit (coarser)
fits.description: Transition fit for larger tolerances and moderate press.

fits.title: Precision transition fit
fits.description: Near line-to-line fit with tight tolerances.

fits.title: Precision light interference fit
fits.description: Light interference fit with precision tolerances.

fits.title: Light press fit
fits.description: Light interference fit for thin sections and light press assembly.

fits.title: Medium press fit
fits.description: Standard press fit for permanent assemblies.

fits.title: Medium-heavy press fit
fits.description: Stronger interference for higher torque transmission.

fits.title: Heavy press fit
fits.description: Heavy interference fit for rigid, permanent assemblies.

fits.title: Force fit
fits.description: Very heavy interference fit for maximum rigidity.

fits.title: Precision light press fit
fits.description: Light press fit with tight tolerances for accurate location.

fits.title: Precision medium press fit
fits.description: Medium interference fit with precision tolerances.

fits.title: Medium press fit (coarser)
fits.description: Press fit with larger tolerances for easier assembly.

fits.title: Heavy press fit (coarser)
fits.description: Heavy interference fit with larger tolerances.

fit_groups.label: ANSI/ASME B4.1
fit_groups.description: Common ANSI/ASME B4.1 fit classes mapped to ISO equivalents for sizing.
fit_groups.calculation_note: Calculated using the closest ISO 286 equivalent; verify with B4.1 tables.

fits.title: Loose running fit
fits.description: Large clearance for running at low precision.

fits.title: Free running fit
fits.description: Free running for low precision assemblies.

fits.title: Medium running fit
fits.description: Medium clearance running fit.

fits.title: Close running fit
fits.description: Close running fit with better alignment.

fits.title: Loose locational fit
fits.description: Loose location for easy assembly.

fits.title: Medium locational fit
fits.description: Medium location clearance fit.

fits.title: Light drive fit
fits.description: Light force fit for simple press assembly.

fits.title: Medium drive fit
fits.description: Medium force fit for moderate drive joints.

fits.title: Light force fit
fits.description: Light force fit for permanent joints.

fits.title: Medium force fit
fits.description: Medium force fit for stronger permanent joints.
